meanings.definition: The quality of being astute or clever in practical matters.
meanings.sent1: Her shrewdnesses in business helped her make wise decisions.
meanings.sent2: His shrewdnesses in negotiations always gave him an advantage.
meanings.sent3: The detective's shrewdnesses in solving cases made him the best in town.
meanings.sent4: She used her shrewdnesses like a sharp tool to navigate through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The shrewdnesses of the squirrel in finding food amazed the onlookers.

meanings.definition: The act of being sharp or keen in judgment or perception.
meanings.sent1: The professor's shrewdnesses in analyzing data were unmatched.
meanings.sent2: His shrewdnesses in understanding human behavior made him a great psychologist.
meanings.sent3: The cat's shrewdnesses in catching mice entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: Her shrewdnesses were like a beacon guiding her through life's challenges.
meanings.sent5: The shrewdnesses of the owl in hunting at night were legendary.
